sims package

sims.hardware_sim module

:mod:”hardware_sim” – Collection of classes to simulate the operation of various hardware devices

  1. 2017 The Cronin Group, University of Glasgow

This file provides a number of simulation classes that behave like the real control classes, but mostly just log the commands rather than actually doing anything.

For style guide used see http://xkcd.com/1513/
